item.title: China Box Office: ‘The Lychee Road’ Debuts at No. 1 as Local Titles Dominate
item.description: China’s box office surged over the July 18–20 weekend, led by a strong showing from local-language titles. “The Lychee Road,” a period drama distributed by Aimmedia Pictures, opened in first place wit
